column4: can anyone help me with remote desktop viewer? i cant get it to connect.
where did you open ports, in router?
i have to open them there as well?
i opened them on the linux firewall firestarter
i forwarded port 5900 on my router to the vnc server. its still not working. what am i doing wrong?
is it enabled on windows side, and he has not disabled it?
both computers are ubuntu and they are both in front of me
have you really enabled "share my desktop option"
